text: Cnut cyncg gret ealle mine biscopas & mine eorlas & mine gerefan on ælcere scire þe æþelnoð arcebiscop & se hired æt Cristes cyrcean land inne habbað freondlice.

& ic cyðe eow þæt ic hæbbe geunnen him þæt he beo his saca & socne wyrðe & griðbryces & hamsocne & forstealles & infangenes þeofes & flymena fyrmðe ofer his agene menn binnan byrig & butan & ofer Cristes cyrcean & ofer swa feala þegna swa ic him to lætan hæbbe.
& ic nelle þæt ænig mann aht þær onteo buton he & his wicneras for þam ic hæbbe Criste þas gerihta forgyfen minre sawle to ecere alysendnesse.
& ic nelle þæt æfre ænig mann þis abrece be minum freondscipe.
